mapper.select: select pmb.* ,project.project_name,project.project_no ,sc.staff_no,sc.staff_name, pmo.join_datetime,pmo.confirmation_date,pmo.tryout_salary,pmo.official_salary,pmo.curr_salary from personnel_monthly_base pmb inner join personnel_monthly_official pmo on pmb.id = pmo.id inner join tb_staff_costs sc on pmb.staff_id = sc.staff_id left JOIN tb_project project on pmb.project_id = project.project_id where pmo.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update personnel_monthly_official set join_datetime=#{join_datetime}, confirmation_date=#{confirmation_date}, tryout_salary=#{tryout_salary}, official_salary=#{official_salary}, curr_salary=#{curr_salary} where id=#{id}
